009package Ch14_ColorimetricColor;
010
011import java.awt.color.ICC_ColorSpace;
012import java.awt.color.ICC_Profile;
013import java.io.IOException;
014
015import ij.IJ;
016import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
017import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
018import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.IccProfile;
019import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
020
021
022/**
023 * This plugin lists the contents of a user-selected ICC profile that is retrieved
024 * from a Java resource.
025 * TODO: add illustrative application of color profile
026 * 
027 * @author WB
028 *
029 */
030public class ICC_Profile_From_JAR implements PlugIn {
031
032        private static IccProfile theChoice = IccProfile.AdobeRGB1998;
033        
034        public void run(String arg) {
035                
036                if (!showDialog())
037                        return;
038                
039                IJ.log("Selected ICC profile: " + theChoice);
040                IJ.log("Reading from JAR: " + (theChoice.isInsideJar()));
041                
042                ICC_Profile profile = null;
043                try {
044                        profile = ICC_Profile.getInstance(theChoice.getStream());
045                } catch (IOException e) { }
046                
047                if (profile == null) {
048                        IJ.error("Could not read ICC profile " + theChoice);
049                        return;
050                }
051
052                IJ.log("profile class = " + profile.getClass().getSimpleName());
053                ICC_ColorSpace iccColorSpace = new ICC_ColorSpace(profile);
054                int nComp = iccColorSpace.getNumComponents();
055                if (nComp != 3) {
056                        IJ.error("Color space must have 3 components, this one has " + nComp);
057                        return;
058                }
059                
060                IJ.log("color space class = " + iccColorSpace.getClass().getSimpleName());
061                IJ.log("color space type = " + iccColorSpace.getType());
062                IJ.log("color space ncomp = " + iccColorSpace.getNumComponents());
063                
064                
065                // specify a device-specific color:
066                float[] deviceColor = {0.77f, 0.13f, 0.89f};
067                //float[] deviceColor = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
068                IJ.log("device color = " + Matrix.toString(deviceColor));
069                
070                // convert to sRGB:
071                float[] sRGBColor = iccColorSpace.toRGB(deviceColor);
072                IJ.log("sRGB = " + Matrix.toString(sRGBColor));
073                
074                // convert to (D50-based) XYZ:
075                float[] XYZColor = iccColorSpace.toCIEXYZ(deviceColor);
076                IJ.log("XYZ = " + Matrix.toString(XYZColor));
077                                
078                deviceColor = iccColorSpace.fromRGB(sRGBColor);
079                IJ.log("device color direct (check) = " + Matrix.toString(deviceColor));
080                
081                deviceColor = iccColorSpace.fromCIEXYZ(XYZColor);
082                IJ.log("device color via XYZ (check) = " + Matrix.toString(deviceColor));
083                
084                // list sRGB Values:
085                for (int ri = 0; ri <= 10; ri++) {
086                        for (int gi = 0; gi <= 10; gi++) {
087                                for (int bi = 0; bi <= 10; bi++) {
088                                        float[] devCol = {ri * 0.1f, gi * 0.1f, bi * 0.1f};
089                                        float[] sRGB = iccColorSpace.toRGB(devCol);
090                                        float[] devColCheck = iccColorSpace.fromRGB(sRGB);
091                                        IJ.log(Matrix.toString(devCol) + " -> " + Matrix.toString(sRGB) + " -> " 
092                                                        + Matrix.toString(devColCheck) + warning(devCol, devColCheck));
093                                }
094                        }
095                }
096        }
097        
098        private String warning(float[] col1, float[] col2) {
099                float t = 0.05f;
100                for (int i = 0; i < col1.length; i++) {
101                        if (Math.abs(col1[i] - col2[i]) > t)
102                                return " ***";
103                }
104                return "";
105        }
106        
107        // -----------------------------------------------------------
108        
109        
110        private boolean showDialog() {
111                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(ICC_Profile_From_JAR.class.getSimpleName());
112                gd.addMessage("Select an ICC profile:");
113                //gd.addChoice("Profile:", choices, choices[0]);
114                gd.addEnumChoice("Profile", theChoice);
115
116                gd.showDialog();
117                if (gd.wasCanceled())
118                        return false;
119                
120                theChoice = gd.getNextEnumChoice(IccProfile.class);
121                return true;
122        }
123}
